name: scaloppine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Italian dish consisting of thin pieces of meat, typically veal (= meat from a young cow), cooked in a thick sauce: She asked the chef if he could make veal scaloppine for her. The scaloppini were cooked to perfection. I sprinkled the scallopine with salt and herbs. Serve the scallopini with rice or buttered noodles.
More examplesFewer examplesThe veal scaloppine are flavoured with ginger and lime.We found a nice restaurant overlooking the river and had a lunch of scaloppine with mushrooms.The chicken scaloppini were served with potatoes and cream.
